name: Flip N' Chick N'
description:
Disclaimer: Couldnt seem to get the mouse cursor to wrap in html build. Id suggest setting mouse sensitivity low and seeing if full screen or not works best for you. GG

You are a chicken with a gravitational flipping device! Your egg dozen has been misplaced and is in danger! You must find and collect all the eggs before your time with the device is up. Use the device to reach platforms. Watch out for spikes! Contact with them will respawn you at the start location.

Controls:

Player Movement: WASD

Camera Movement: Mouse operated

Gravitational Device: Space -- causes gravity to invert itself
